rules.title: Respect and Communication
rules.description: All members must treat each other with respect and communicate in a friendly manner. Toxic behavior is not tolerated.

rules.title: Activity Requirements
rules.description: Members must log in at least 3 times a week. Inactivity for more than 7 days without notice may lead to removal.

rules.title: Participation in Events
rules.description: Participation in alliance wars, events, and tasks is mandatory unless an excuse is provided in advance.

rules.title: Hierarchy and Obedience
rules.description: Follow the instructions of the Alliance Leader, Deputy Leader, and Admins. Do not challenge authority in public channels.

rules.title: Donations and Contributions
rules.description: Members should regularly donate resources to help the alliance grow. Minimum weekly quota: 500 points.

rules.title: Promotion Rules
rules.description: Promotions are based on activity, contribution, and attitude. Do not ask for promotions repeatedly.

rules.title: Conflict Resolution
rules.description: Conflicts between members should be reported to management and resolved peacefully. No drama.
